rules_text:
Sworn Company is a Cleric, Warrior and Wizard in addition to its other types.
As long as you control a full party, Sworn Company gains vigilance and has “{T}: Put a shield counter onto target creature you control. You gain 2 life. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard. If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
